feed.title: Mini QR Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Mini QR: v0.14.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add PWA support for desktop and mobile installation by @lyqht in https://github.com/lyqht/mini-qr/pull/96

Full Changelog: https://github.com/lyqht/mini-qr/compare/v0.13.1...v0.14.0

entry.title: New release for Mini QR: v0.15.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add PWA support for desktop and mobile installation by @lyqht in https://github.com/lyqht/mini-qr/pull/96
  • Add jpg export by @lyqht in https://github.com/lyqht/mini-qr/pull/99
  • Add QR code frame feature with customizable text and styling by @lyqht in https://github.com/lyqht/mini-qr/pull/100
  • Add camera switching feature to QR code scanner by @lyqht in https://github.com/lyqht/mini-qr/pull/103
  • Add translations by @lyqht in https://github.com/lyqht/mini-qr/pull/104

Full Changelog: https://github.com/lyqht/mini-qr/compare/v0.13.1...v0.15.0

entry.title: New release for Mini QR: v0.16.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add Playwright E2E testing framework by @lyqht in https://github.com/lyqht/mini-qr/pull/106
  • New Crowdin updates by @katullo11 in https://github.com/lyqht/mini-qr/pull/108
  • Remove svg export option by @lyqht in https://github.com/lyqht/mini-qr/pull/112
  • Add Vitest and data templates for QR codes by @lyqht in https://github.com/lyqht/mini-qr/pull/109

Full Changelog: https://github.com/lyqht/mini-qr/compare/v0.15.0...v0.16.0

entry.title: New release for Mini QR: v0.17.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Enhance form styling and fix drawer z-index by @lyqht in https://github.com/lyqht/mini-qr/pull/115
  • Add frame text support for batch QR code generation by @lyqht in https://github.com/lyqht/mini-qr/pull/117

Full Changelog: https://github.com/lyqht/mini-qr/compare/v0.16.0...v0.17.0

entry.title: New release for Mini QR: v0.17.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add back SVG export option by @lyqht in https://github.com/lyqht/mini-qr/pull/120

Full Changelog: https://github.com/lyqht/mini-qr/compare/v0.17.0...v0.17.1
